Accession	P54284;A8K0Z4;B7Z4Q1;B7Z973;B7ZAK8;F5GZW7;F5H2P6;F8VSG3;Q13913
EntryName	CACB3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Voltage-dependent L-type calcium channel subunit beta-3 (CAB3) (Calcium channel voltage-dependent subunit beta 3)
GeneName	CACNB3 CACNLB3
Length	443
Function	Regulatory subunit of the voltage-gated calcium channel that gives rise to L-type calcium currents (PubMed:8119293). Increases CACNA1B peak calcium current and shifts the voltage dependencies of channel activation and inactivation (By similarity). Increases CACNA1C peak calcium current and shifts the voltage dependencies of channel activation and inactivation (By similarity).
